task.title: Dipping the headlight beams
task.shortdesc: The headlight beam dipping switch lets you lower the height of the headlight beams as a courtesy to oncoming vehicles.

context.p: The headlight beam dipping switch is located in the center of the toeboard and is foot-operated.
The switch is an on/off toggle, dipping the beams on one depression and raising them on the next.
context.note: A light at the top of the instrument dial glows blue when the beams are in the raised position.

step.cmd: Press the switch with your foot.
Press the switch with your foot again.
step.stepresult: The headlight beams return to the their normal position.
